attributes.action: Have more diversity in professional ballet dance
attributes.background: Debate about allowing more professional ballet companies to allow more diversity into the dance community so instead of having mainly white ballet dancers instead allow more diversity into the dance community.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or House of Commons is directly responsible for.

Decisions about attending dance schools or joining a ballet company is a matter for individual schools and companies, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to create bursaries for people wanting to train as ballerinas, to increase opportunities for individuals to become ballerinas.
